title: Spicy Mexican rice
ingredients: ['olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '200ml white basmati rice (measured in a measuring jug)', '1 good pinch dried chilli flakes', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 teaspoon garlic paste', '1 good pinch dried oregano', '550ml hot chicken stock']
